history.message:
Hi Alicia,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Alicia,

Wow. Fantastic. This was a fascinating read, and suits our publication very well. We'd love to have it in The Decadent Review.

We'll have to pass it through an editorial process, but it seems all right as is, though I'd certainly change the title to something more punchy.

We'll continue this over email (as registered on Submittable - sometimes those end up in the junk folder, so make sure to check that).

We are unusually slow nowadays due high volume of submissions, so we ask for a little patience on your part (doing our best).

Thank you, and health above all,

D.

Dear Alicia Manno,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
